article.description: James Batemon had 21 points as Loyola Marymount topped Brown 81-63 in the College Basketball Invitational second round on Monday night.
article.headline: Batemon carries Loyola Marymount over Brown 81-63 in CBI
article.linkText: Batemon carries Loyola Marymount over Brown 81-63 in CBI
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- James Batemon had 21 points as Loyola Marymount topped Brown 81-63 in the College Basketball Invitational second round on Monday night. Joe Quintana had 12 points for Loyola Marymount (22-11). Mattias Markusson and Zafir Williams had 11 points each for the hosts. Obi Okolie had 14 points for the Bears (20-12). Chris Sullivan added 11 points. --- For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP-Top25 --- This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
